documents.content: Common React patterns in Malaysian tech companies: 1) Custom hooks for form validation with multiple languages 2) Context API for managing multilingual state 3) Responsive designs for mobile-first Malaysian users 4) Integration with local payment gateways like iPay88 and MOLPay.

Python data analysis for Malaysian datasets: Using pandas to analyze local business data, processing MyKad numbers, handling Malaysian date formats (DD/MM/YYYY), and working with Bank Negara Malaysia's open data API.
